SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client

Class LDAPResult

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.LDAPResult
public class LDAPResult extends Object
Represents an LDAP operation result.

This is the base result type returned by LDAP operations such as bind, search, modify, add, delete, etc.

Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Constructor Details

    • LDAPResult

      public LDAPResult(LDAPResultCode resultCode, String matchedDN, String diagnosticMessage)
      Creates a new LDAP result.
      Parameters:
      resultCode - the result code
      matchedDN - the matched DN (may be empty)
      diagnosticMessage - the diagnostic message (may be empty)

    • LDAPResult

      public LDAPResult(LDAPResultCode resultCode, String matchedDN, String diagnosticMessage, List<String> referrals)
      Creates a new LDAP result with referrals.
      Parameters:
      resultCode - the result code
      matchedDN - the matched DN (may be empty)
      diagnosticMessage - the diagnostic message (may be empty)
      referrals - the referral URLs (may be null)

  • Method Details

    • getResultCode

      public LDAPResultCode getResultCode()
      Returns the result code.
      Returns:
      the result code

    • isSuccess

      public boolean isSuccess()
      Returns whether the operation was successful.
      Returns:
      true if the result code is SUCCESS

    • getMatchedDN

      public String getMatchedDN()
      Returns the matched DN.

      For operations that fail with NO_SUCH_OBJECT, this contains the portion of the DN that was matched.

      Returns:
      the matched DN, may be empty

    • getDiagnosticMessage

      public String getDiagnosticMessage()
      Returns the diagnostic message.

      This may contain additional information about the result, especially for error conditions.

      Returns:
      the diagnostic message, may be empty

    • hasReferrals

      public boolean hasReferrals()
      Returns whether referrals were returned.
      Returns:
      true if referrals exist

    • getReferrals

      public List<String> getReferrals()
      Returns the referral URLs.
      Returns:
      unmodifiable list of referral URLs
